column1: #Text=Zei says : " Sandbenders , shoo , away from the bison ! "
#Text=Zei says : " Tell me , sky bison , are you the last of your breed ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Does this place even exist ?
#Text=" Zei says : " Some say it does n't .
#Text=" Toph says : " Should n't you have mentioned that before ?
